review:
I was trying to conceive since 2020 and met several doctors .Also took many HCG injections and underwent IUI for 2 cycles but was unable to conceive.Doctors clearly told me I cannot conceive in the natural way,either i have to go through iui process or IVF.With the help of many HCG injections I was able to conceive in Jan 2022..but due to growth issues the heartbeat of the baby didn't came and I had to abort in Feb 2022. Then we met doctor deepmala in june 2022 for the problem in conceiving as I was having pcos and thyroid....I was so depressed and eager to conceive that I told her that I want to conceive at the earliest but doctor deepmala unlike other doctors told me to start following a healthy diet along with regular exercise in order to reduce weight.She didn't even  gave me HCG injections neither told me to get the follicular study done every alternate day..and also she told me to wait for 3-4 months then we will look into other options . All these 3-4 months I started doing gym to reduce my weight and followed a healthy diet but one thing kept clicking my mind that all these 2 years nothing has happened and i couldn't conceive then what new  will happen now..Then in oct 2022 I again met doctor deepmala for regular check up...she was happy seeing my weight loss and encouraged me to further to reduce my weight.she gave me minimal medicines.
With god's grace and doctor deepmala's advice i conceived in nov 2022...doctor deepmala gave me proper advice in follow up check ups and also sometimes scolded me when I was taking taking care of myself during pregnancy.My LFT ,SGPT and SGOT was little bit higher so every now and then I called and messaged doctor deepmala and she was always available over phone.My due date was in July 2023 but Doctor deepmala adviced me for a early delivery as i had problems with the increased levels of LFT,SGPT,SGOT.But she was sure that my delivery will be normal only.I got admitted on 24th June ....Dr deepmala was in constant touch will the staff of the delivery room .The moment junior doctors informed Dr deepmala that situation is not good for the baby,she rushed from her home to hospital at 12 'o clock in the night..I was shifted to OT and my C Section was done.I gave birth to a lovely baby girl...it has all happened because of Dr deepmala....She has made my 9 months  journey easy and made it possible for me to enjoy the journey to motherhood with happiness.Dr deepmala has made us parents which we were thinking is not in our fate.
I would strongly recommend all ladies  to consult Dr deepmala and see the magic ....** ******** * * *** *****
Thanks a lot mam
Nandini and Ajit
And load of love from cutie VAIDEHI
